traits.Amphibious: The hippocamp can breathe air and water.
traits.Charge: If the hippocamp moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.Hooves: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Ram: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
